#summary What to do when you a Google project isn't in the repository.
#labels Featured

=Where is my favorite Google project?=

All Google Open Source projects are encouraged to publish to the central maven repository (see [GuidelinesForGoogleMavenProjects]). You can search the central repo at http://oss.sonatype.org/.

If your favorite Google project is not available in the central repo, please file an issue with that project. Also, in the spirit of open source, you may [http://www.sonatype.com/people/2010/04/uploading-artifacts-to-the-central-maven-repository-diy/ upload the project yourself].
